parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The provided post does not contain a CMF number.  While the absence of a CMF number doesn't automatically exclude it from being electoral propaganda, it suggests it might not be directly linked to an official campaign.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>The post refers to Raluca Giorgiana Dumitrescu, who is identified as a PSD deputy in Ialomița County.  This directly links the post to a specific parliamentary candidate, fulfilling Article 36 (7) - a.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>The post is a paid Facebook advertisement, targeting a wide audience in Ialomița County, Romania.  The reach estimate is 100K-500K, clearly indicating an attempt to reach a large segment of the population. This satisfies Article 36 (7) - c.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The post's link directs to the Chamber of Deputies website (cdep.ro), specifically to the page of the deputy Raluca Giorgiana Dumitrescu. While not explicitly urging a vote, the context strongly suggests an electoral objective: promoting the candidate and her activities within the parliament. This fulfills Article 36 (7) - c. The image, if present and showing the candidate in a positive light, would further strengthen this conclusion.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>The post does not present itself as journalistic. It lacks the characteristics of objective reporting, analysis, or opinion pieces. The link to the candidate's parliamentary page is promotional rather than informative in a journalistic sense.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>The content is not a personal opinion; it's a paid advertisement promoting a political candidate.  The context and the targeting clearly indicate an intention to influence voters.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>1120928716120960</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The post, a paid Facebook advertisement by Raluca Giorgiana Dumitrescu, a PSD deputy, promotes her activities and links to her parliamentary page.  While not explicitly calling for votes, the context, targeting, and the link to her official page strongly suggest an electoral objective. The advertisement fulfills the criteria of Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006: it refers to a specific candidate (a), targets a wide audience (c), and has an electoral objective (c).  The absence of a CMF number is not decisive, given the other strong indicators of electoral propaganda.  The post's end date (1732867200) needs to be checked against the official end date of the electoral campaign to determine if it violates Article 98 t) of LEGE nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015. If the post ran after the legal end date of the campaign, it would be a violation.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>RALUCA GIORGIANA DUMITRESCU</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>PSD</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
Raluca Giorgiana Dumitrescu, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea unei reclame plătite pe Facebook după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, cu ID-ul postării 1120928716120960, care promovează activitatea sa parlamentară și conține un link către pagina sa de pe site-ul Camerei Deputaților, având ca efect electoral creșterea vizibilității și a popularității sale în rândul alegătorilor din județul Ialomița.  Reclama îndeplinește criteriile articolului 36 (7) din LEGEA nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006, referindu-se direct la un candidat (a), adresându-se publicului larg (c) și având un obiectiv electoral clar (c).  Chiar dacă nu solicită explicit voturi, contextul, direcționarea și link-ul către pagina sa oficială indică o intenție clară de a influența votul.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
